definitions.definition: Concerning the relationships between the governments of countries .
examples: She spent thirty years working for Canada's diplomatic service.
Albania immediately severed diplomatic relations with Zimbabwe.

definitions.definition: Exhibiting diplomacy ; exercising tact or courtesy ; using discussion to avoid hard feelings , fights or arguments .
examples: Thoughtful corrections can be diplomatic as well as instructional.

definitions.definition: Describing a publication of a text which follows a single basic manuscript , but with variants in other manuscripts noted in the critical apparatus .
Relating to diplomatics , or the study of old texts; paleographic .

main_definition: Concerning the relationships between the governments of countries .
